languages.text: At the beginning of the holder's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, all enemies in a 3-cell radius gain +1 stack of {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} for each common effect on this enemy.
languages.original_text: Все враги в радиусе 3 клеток с состоянием кровотечения получают +3 урона от кровотечения и −15 к Выносливости и Воле.

traits.locale_text: At the beginning of the holder's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, all enemies in a 3-cell radius gain +1 stack of {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} for each {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}common effect{/g} on this enemy.
At the beginning of the holder's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, all enemies in a 3-cell radius gain +1 stack of {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} for each common effect on this enemy.

languages.text: В начале {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} персонажа каждый противник в радиусе 3 клеток получает +1 уровень {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}кровотечения{/g} за каждый обычный эффект, действующий на этого врага.
装备者回合{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始时，3格内所有敌人身上每有一个常规{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}效果{/g}，该名敌人就会获得1层{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}流血{/g}效果。
languages.original_text: At the beginning of the holder's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, all enemies in a 3-cell radius gain +1 stack of {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} for each common {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g} on this enemy.

traits.locale_text: 装备者回合{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始时，3格内所有敌人身上每有一个常规{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}效果{/g}，该名敌人就会获得1层{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}流血{/g}效果。

languages.text: 保有者の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}開始時、半径3セル以内の敵すべてがこの敵の一般{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}効果{/g}に対して{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}出血{/g}のスタックを1付与する。
languages.original_text: At the beginning of the holder's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, all enemies in a 3-cell radius gain +1 stack of {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} for each common {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g} on this enemy.

traits.locale_text: 保有者の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}開始時、半径3セル以内の敵すべてがこの敵の一般{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}効果{/g}に対して{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}出血{/g}のスタックを1付与する。

languages.text: Al principio del {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del portador, todos los enemigos a un radio de 3 casillas obtienen +1 acumulación de {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}hemorragia{/g} por cada {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}efecto{/g} común que tenga cada uno.
languages.original_text: At the beginning of the holder's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, all enemies in a 3-cell radius gain +1 stack of {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} for each common {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g} on this enemy.

traits.locale_text: Al principio del {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del portador, todos los enemigos a un radio de 3 casillas obtienen +1 acumulación de {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}hemorragia{/g} por cada {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}efecto{/g} común que tenga cada uno.

languages.text: Zu Beginn des {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zugs{/g} des Trägers erhalten alle Feinde in einem 3-Zellen-Radius +1 Stapel {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Blutung{/g} für jeden gemeinsamen Effekt auf diesem Feind.
languages.original_text: At the beginning of the holder's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, all enemies in a 3-cell radius gain +1 stack of {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} for each common effect on this enemy.

traits.locale_text: Zu Beginn des {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} des Trägers erhalten alle Feinde in einem 3-Zellen-Radius +1 Stapel {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Blutung{/g} für jeden gemeinsamen {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}Effekt{/g} auf diesem Feind.

languages.text: Au début du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} de l'utilisateur, tous les ennemis présents dans un rayon de 3 cases reçoivent +1 cumul de {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Saignement{/g} pour chaque {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effet{/g} commun appliqué à ces ennemis.
